	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.1.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple

	override_background = {

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows

		event_background = gallows

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.1.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 181
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 182
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 181
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 181
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 182
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 182
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 181: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.181
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 181
				scope:first_transition_1 = 181
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 181
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 182: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.182
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 182
				scope:first_transition_1 = 182
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 182
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}

	# FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL: Privileges of Power
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night

	override_background = {

		event_background = corridor_day

	override_background = {

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}

			10 = {

					value = 187

			}
		}

			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 187
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 187

				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0

						scope:first_transition_0 = 188
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 188
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 187: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.187
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 187
				scope:first_transition_1 = 187
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 187
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 188: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.188
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 188
				scope:first_transition_1 = 188
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 188
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.5 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE: Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.5.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.5.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 189
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 190
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 189
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 189
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 190
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 190
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 189: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.189
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 189
				scope:first_transition_1 = 189
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 189
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 190: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.190
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 190
				scope:first_transition_1 = 190
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 190
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.6 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL: An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.6.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 191
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 192
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 191
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 191
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 192
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 192
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 191: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.191
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 191
				scope:first_transition_1 = 191
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 191
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 192: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.192
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 192
				scope:first_transition_1 = 192
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 192
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

LIDAf.7 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER: Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.7.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 193
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 194
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 193
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 193
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 194
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 194
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 193: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.193
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 193
				scope:first_transition_1 = 193
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 193
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 194: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.194
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 194
				scope:first_transition_1 = 194
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 194
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

LIDAf.8 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL: The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.8.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 195
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 196
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 195
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 195
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 196
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 196
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 195: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.195
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 195
				scope:first_transition_1 = 195
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 195
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 196: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.196
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 196
				scope:first_transition_1 = 196
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 196
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.9 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE: Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.9.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 197
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 198
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 197
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 197
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 198
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 198
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 197: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.197
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 197
				scope:first_transition_1 = 197
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 197
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 198: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.198
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 198
				scope:first_transition_1 = 198
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 198
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.10 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL: A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.10.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 199
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 200
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 199
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 199
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 200
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 200
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 199: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.199
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 199
				scope:first_transition_1 = 199
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 199
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 200: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.200
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 200
				scope:first_transition_1 = 200
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 200
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

LIDAf.11 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE: Spicing it Up
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.11.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 201
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 202
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 201
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 201
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 202
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 202
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 201: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.201
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 201
				scope:first_transition_1 = 201
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 201
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 202: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.202
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 202
				scope:first_transition_1 = 202
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 202
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.12 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL: Flowers in Bloom
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.12.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.12.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:garden
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 203
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 204
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 203
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 203
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 204
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 204
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 203: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.203
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 203
				scope:first_transition_1 = 203
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 203
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 204: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.204
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 204
				scope:first_transition_1 = 204
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 204
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.13 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL: Chains of Command
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.13.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 205
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 206
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 205
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 205
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 206
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 206
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 205: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.205
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 205
				scope:first_transition_1 = 205
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 205
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 206: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.206
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 206
				scope:first_transition_1 = 206
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 206
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.14 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL: Privileges of Power
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.14.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.14.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 207
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 208
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 207
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 207
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 208
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 208
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 207: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.207
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 207
				scope:first_transition_1 = 207
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 207
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 208: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.208
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 208
				scope:first_transition_1 = 208
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 208
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

LIDAf.15 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE: Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.15.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.15.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 209
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 210
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 209
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 209
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 210
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 210
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 209: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.209
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 209
				scope:first_transition_1 = 209
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 209
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 210: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.210
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 210
				scope:first_transition_1 = 210
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 210
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.16 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL: An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.16.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.16.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 211
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 212
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 211
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 211
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 212
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 212
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 211: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.211
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 211
				scope:first_transition_1 = 211
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 211
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 212: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.212
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 212
				scope:first_transition_1 = 212
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 212
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.17 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER: Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.17.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.17.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 213
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 214
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 213
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 213
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 214
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 214
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 213: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.213
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 213
				scope:first_transition_1 = 213
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 213
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 214: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.214
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 214
				scope:first_transition_1 = 214
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 214
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.18 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL: The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.18.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.18.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 215
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 216
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 215
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 215
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 216
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 216
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 215: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.215
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 215
				scope:first_transition_1 = 215
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 215
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 216: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.216
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 216
				scope:first_transition_1 = 216
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 216
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}

		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
